organizationList.title: Organizations
organizationList.description: Jump into an existing organization or add a new one.
organizationList.adjustSearch: Adjust your search query to show more.
organizationList.addFirstOrganization: Add your first organization to get started.

organizationMembers.title: Organization Members
organizationMembers.searchPlaceholder: Search members by name or email...
organizationMembers.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
organizationMembers.noMembersYet: Your organization doesn't have any members yet.
organizationMembers.removeMemberConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {{memberName}} from the organization?

organizationRoles.title: Organization Roles
organizationRoles.description: Manage roles and their permissions. Lower hierarchy levels have more authority (0 is highest).
organizationRoles.createRoleDescription: Create a new role with a specific hierarchy level. Lower levels have more authority (0 is highest).
organizationRoles.roleNameDescription: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only
organizationRoles.hierarchyLevelDescription: 0-10, where lower numbers have more authority (0 is highest)
organizationRoles.editPermissionsDescription: Select the permissions this role should have within the organization.
organizationRoles.noCustomRolesYet: Your organization doesn't have any custom roles yet.
organizationRoles.deleteRoleDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{roleName}}" role?
organizationRoles.memberReassignmentDescription: Any members with this role will be automatically reassigned to another role based on hierarchy:
